question: You have a Facebook friend living in another country and s/he is curious to learn about a major news item in your country.Write a letter to your Facebook friend. In your letterdescribe a news story in your countryexplain why people are interested in itsay how the story personally relates to you
text: Nice to hear from you after a long time. Hope this finds you well. It is really nice to hear your interest in gems and jewellery. So, you have asked me about the largest gem that we found recently in the Rathnapura area. At the first, I was surprised that you ask about this, see how fast this news travel.

To begin with, as you may know already it is the largest stone that we have ever found. Moreover, according to the authorities, it is the largest of its kind. Thus, they are yet to define a value for it, I heard they have already found some buyers who are willing to buy this by any means.
It is not strange, why people need to keep this in their possession. It will definitely help to show their pride and wealth to the world.

You might  not know this headline is so important to me because of two reasons. First, I also live nearby to the site where we found this gem. Secondly, I am also a person who collects these kinds of things.
Let me stop here. Please find some photos of my collection on the next page, If you need any more details, please feel free to contact me.
